data.message: They hating on you Em... they making jokes and laughing at you cuz you didn't live stream at Reading. Don't listen to them, they should have just bought tickets like everyone else. LOL

Laughing and making jokes at Eminem is one of the things that never prolly happend and it will prolly never happen, who do you think he is..lil fucking yachty?
